attributes.additional_details:
Make hospital facilities available which are fit for our troops:

Action 1  Secure hospital places for injured troops ... so they can not be attacked by terrorists etc

Action 2 Appropriate facilities for injured troops , currently under resourced for burns (a major hazard in current warfare) and associated respiratory and other areas.

Action 3 More military medical nurses and doctors consultants in NHS hospitals and GPs (respectfully) are not experienced in troop needs

Action 4 Ask the troops what facilities they need home and abroad, implement their requests

Action 5 raise NI by 1% to improve those hospitals supporting the troops
